update t_station_loan_info set station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, loan_type = #{loanType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month_pay = #{monthPay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_dttm = #{createDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_dttm = #{updateDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
